column2: "Wow, so this is the Health Drink, meow! I'm going to drink it right away!"
"*glug, glug*...mmm, it doesn't taste very good, meow. Why does everything say it's delicious, meow? How weird."
"Hehehe, thanks for hearing out my request, meow! Now I've got another request, meow."
"I want to be better friends with all of the ARKS, meow. If it's okay, I want to be your friend, meow."
"Here is my partner card, meow! I'm counting on you, meow!"
